remarks: If cyclically shifting a word by two positions results in the same word, cyclically shifting the word by the difference of these two positions results in the original word itself.  (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
statement: cshweqdifid $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) = ( W cyclShift M ) -> ( W cyclShift ( M - N ) ) = W ) ) $.
